body_html:
In the matrix_inverse function source the inverse is computed only if adjoint is set to true.
Check here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/linalg_grad.py

For real numbers we have to calculate the adjoint of the matrix in order to get the inverse but for the case of complex numbers in a matrix the inverse is calculated using conjugate transpose or hermitian transpose.

More here:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conjugate_transpose

So for the time being it works only fot real numbers.
Hope this helps.
